Song:
  Tempo: 100
  Kit:
    - bass:   test/sounds/bass_mono_8.wav
    - snare:  test/sounds/snare_mono_8.wav
    - hihat:  [test/sounds/hh_closed_mono_8.wav, test/sounds/missing.wav]   # "missing.wav" is a non-existent file
  Flow:
    - Verse:  x2
    - Chorus: x2

Verse:
  - bass:    X...X...
  - snare:   ..X...X.
Chorus:
  - bass:    XXXXXXXX
  - [snare, hihat]:  .X.X.X.X
